General.Name: Industrial Alliance Insurance and Financial Services Inc Pref Series B
General.Description: iA Financial Corporation Inc., through its subsidiary, Industrial Alliance Insurance and Financial Services Inc., provides various life and health insurance products in Canada and the United States. The company operates through Individual Insurance, Individual Wealth Management, Group Insurance, Group Savings and Retirement, and US Operations businesses. It also offers life, health, and disability insurance, as well as car, recreation vehicle, home, mortgage, and travel insurance. In addition, the company provides savings and investment, investment fund, private wealth management, registered retirement savings plan loan, and private wealth products and services. Further, it provides collective insurance and group pension plan, real estate, advisory, and brokerage services. iA Financial Corporation Inc. was founded in 1892 and is headquartered in Québec, Canada.
General.Address: 1080 Grande AllEe West, Québec, QC, Canada, G1K 7M3
